intent: Develop an AI-powered mobile application named 'SmartChef' that provides personalized recipe recommendations by analyzing photos of user-held ingredients, incorporating features like filtering, dietary restrictions, calorie tracking, and shopping list generation.
functional_requirements: Analyze photos of ingredients users have at home.
Allow users to filter recipes by cuisine type.
Allow users to filter recipes by cooking time.
Support dietary restrictions for recipe suggestions (Vegan, Gluten-Free).
technical_constraints: Utilize Computer Vision for ingredient detection.
Develop mobile applications using React Native.
ambiguities: The term 'Veggjes Soy' in the platform specification is unclear and likely an OCR error; clarification is needed on the second target platform.
Specific definition or implementation details for 'personalized recipes' are not provided.
The method of implementation for 'Calorie Tracking Per Meal' is not specified (e.g., manual entry, automatic calculation based on ingredients, external API integration).
Absence of specific UI/UX design requirements.
Lack of explicit performance or scalability requirements.
Missing details on quality assurance or testing processes.
No specified data privacy or security requirements.
Unspecified mechanisms or target platforms for 'Social Sharing of Recipes'.
The scope covered by the provided budget ($12,000) and timeline (5 months) is not detailed (e.g., development only, deployment, ongoing support).
